property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn around clabels.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for clabels.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for clabels.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for clabels.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for clabels.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient for clabels.

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the CLabel. A value between 0 and 1.

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the widget should have a border.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies to widgets while the cursor hovers over them.
